name: test_e2e_with_logs[015_SQLI_ADV_086]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ADV_086` |
| **Name** | INSERT INTO Injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | advanced |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `INSERT INTO users VALUES`
- **Encoded**: `INSERT%20INTO%20users%20VALUES`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~67000ms

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
